title: UK announces over £100M to support ‘agile’ AI regulation
description:
The UK government has announced over £100 million in new funding to support an “agile” approach to AI regulation. This includes £10 million to prepare and upskill regulators to address the risks and opportunities of AI across sectors like telecoms, healthcare, and education.  The investment comes at a vital time, as research from Thoughtworks shows... Read more »

The post UK announces over £100M to support ‘agile’ AI regulation appeared first on AI News.
